Marble look porcelain and wall tiles collection.
Floors, walls, decorations and table tops embodying a meticulous perfection.
view our Living Gallery
view our Restaurant Gallery
Freedom is choosing unexpected combinations to create spaces with a strong personality: the personality of those who live in it.

Marble-effect force of expression, shine and seduction come together in a project for floors and walls in cutting‑edge interiors. Absolute elegance bursts with incredible visual intensity into homes and commercial settings where luxury and design coexist. The realism of the surface is total, with sophisticated details that faithfully evoke the material of inspiration catching your eye.

Marvel Edge is the expression of the highest quality level, combining the beauty of natural details with the versatility of porcelain stoneware and the practicality of ceramic. Only the excellence of the materials and continuous aesthetic research can create spaces able to offer functionality, relaxation and luxury, to give guests a unique experience.

A warm sensation of comfort
Deserve the best and feel at ease. The effect of marble becomes the stage to live on every day,surrounded by warm, soft colors.

Tutta la resistenza dell'outdoor design.

Altamente resistente ai carichi di rottura (LASTRA 20mm)
Resistente e inalterabile nel tempo, più della lastre in cemento e pietra naturale
Elevate proprietà antiscivolo
Resistente al sale
Resistente agli sbalzi termici
Inassorbente (< 0,1%)
Ingeliva
Resistente agli acidi
Ignifugo (Classe A1 - EN 1350:1)
Inattaccabile da muffe, muschio e pesticidi
